On 8/8/2020 at 9:32 PM, Beale said:

Well without further ado, here is the inital GitHub commit of TantaresSP, that is, Tantares - Space Probes.
A new mod focusing compltely on robotic lunar / interplanetary exploration.

https://github.com/Tantares/TantaresSP

As ever, this mod has no dependencies, but I will be looking to integrate with DMOS, or BDB if you have them installed - to share experiment definitions.

Few things still need to be configured, such as the cosmic ray detector, but the ion trap experiment is fully implemented, but a little basic.
Right now you can create a generic 1MV spacecraft, but neither Mars 1M or Venera 1VA exactly, yet.

More to come while I learn with rigging an unfurling antenna.

Tentative mod plans:

  • 1MV
  • 3MV
  • 4MV
  • Prop-M
  • Special eggs
  • Special washing machines
  • Cats?!?!
  • Cars?!?!
  • Spikey bois
  • Luna?
  • Fobos?


Tantares-style Soviet probe parts!!!!! Oh how long I've waited for you! Beautiful!

Why does my Vega size 2 to size 1.5 inline adapter have no texture? It had one before I updated to the 1.10 version (I'm using 1.10.1)

 

Oh man do I want some proper Luna parts that I can put together myself. Rocket Emporium kind of has the eggs for the Luna missions, Coatl has a full set of Venera 9 parts but the only other mod I've found is the soviet probes pack, and I don't think they match the stock aesthetic at all. I would LOVE some lunokhod rover bits holy crap. Nobody's really made the wheels or really any of the other stuff like the flip up solar  panel lid and body, which is surprising since the only thing that's broken the distance record of Lunokhod 2 was Opportunity. I'm gonna download this immediately.

The missing texture issue should be solved, if you are using the latest version of Tantares, and using KSP 1.10.1

Unfortunately fairings were... well, things were done to them by the devs between 1.9 and 1.10. It's out of my control, but they were very broken by it, so you need to update everything to latest.

@oniontrain I would love Lunokhod, but it's cautiously out of scope now because of wheels, the rest is (again, cautiously) in scope though.

6 hours ago, Beale said:

I'm impressed but frightened by the scale of this.

The US section is a little bigger than the irl version, and it does start to lag on my laptop. The Russian section is pretty much 1 to 1 in scale though. The only thing I had to jerry rig were the NEM 1 and 2 solar panels.

Final shakedown tests.



Spoiler

Yes, the camera is functional, and it outputs red, green, and blue images separately to the screenshots folder, for you, ground control, to stack.

Not quite ready to talk about this fully yet, and I've had some major help that really needs to be credited, but when the time is right

Venera 1's camera is currently able to produce 500 lines, but that's a bit too hi-res, that will be downgraded.

Eve at close flyby.

Gilly at a distance (it's about 6 pixels across).

Eve on approach (It's so far away there is little delay on capturing each colour, so not much colour bleeding).

 

Edited August 15, 2020 by Beale
@Beale That camera stuff is actually really cool , I don t think I ve ever seen anything like this in a mod before

TantaresSP Version 1.0

Little space probes. Thanks for those who tested and provided references.
So far, this only adds two early interplanetary probes:

  • Mars 1M
  • Venera 1VA

Both are nearly identical outside of scientific instruments.

and

 

 

You can use my other new mod Neptune Camera to make the camera parts on the probes more than just science experiments.

Did you recently deprecate a bunch of parts, @Beale? I have all 3 Tantares packs installed (latest versions for 1.10 in 1.10; Tantares, TantaresLV and TantaresSP), and around half of the craft files you provide are missing parts. Most of the parts are titled Eridani.[Something]. Here's the parts that are missing for the craft files that you provided (in spoiler below, to save space in the thread):

Spoiler

 

[FGB Tug]
Eridani.Antenna.1
(Note: [Soyuz-7K-TM], [TKS] and Polyus are also missing Eridani.Antenna.1)

[Mir Module]
Eridani.Solar.1.2
(Note: [Mir] Kvant-2 and [Mir] Spektr are also missing Eridani.Solar.1.2)

[Mir] Core Module
Eridani.Crew.1

[Mir] Kristall
Eridani.DockingMechanism.2
(Note: Zarya FGB is also missing Eridani.DockingMechanism.2)

[Mir] Kvant
Acamar.Lab.1

[Mir] Priroda
Eridani.DockingMechanism.1

[Progress]
Eridani.Antenna.2
(Note: [Soyuz-7K-T] is also missing Eridani.Antenna.2)

Energia-Polyus
Rana.Truss.2

 

There's also some external craft files, such as those used by Modular Launch Pads, that are missing some parts. From what I can tell, the MLP craft files are missing the part Tantares.Crew.1

Have these parts been replaced with new parts that perform the same function? If so, what was the last version that these parts were in before they were deprecated? If the new parts are still roughly the same shape/size, I'd like to either try to merge those parts in to my current tantares directory, or bring them in long enough to update the craft files by swapping out all of the parts that were deprecated with their new counterparts.

There's also some external craft files, such as those used by Modular Launch Pads, that are missing some parts. From what I can tell, the MLP craft files are missing the part Tantares.Crew.1

Have these parts been replaced with new parts that perform the same function? If so, what was the last version that these parts were in before they were deprecated? If the new parts are still roughly the same shape/size, I'd like to either try to merge those parts in to my current tantares directory, or bring them in long enough to update the craft files by swapping out all of the parts that were deprecated with their new counterparts.

Oh unfortunately yeah it looks like those crafts are using the old Mir parts, there should be newer equivalents for all of them if you search "mir" in the VAB, but in a nutshell:

  • eridani.antenna.1/2 - I think this is the whip antenna, should be called octans whip antenna now I think
  • eridani.solar.x.x - Various mir solar panels, should all have equivs. now.
  • eridani.crew.1 - the core mir module blocks, same deal.
  • eridani.docking.mechanism.2 - I used to have two sets of very similar but redundant docking ports, I've moved this to just the 1 set of "octans" ports now.
  • acamar.x.x - any acamar parts have been replaced with newer models, find by "37K" in VAB.
  • rana.truss.x - these are the sofora girder parts, again all replaced

Hope that helps

Again, I would replace these if I had the time lately, but it's play a little KSP or get mods done, doesn't leave much time for make craft files

 

Edited August 17, 2020 by Beale
